    • Constructor Detail

      • HistoricalSimulationCalc

        public HistoricalSimulationCalc(Portfolio p,
                                double confidence,
                                int timeHorizon)
        This constructor creates a Historical Simulation Calculator. It calculates the value at risk of a portfolio over a time horizon with a level of confidence.
        Parameters:
        p - this is the portfolio that gets passed in from a source.
        confidence - this is the confidence interval that is used to calculate VaR
        timeHorizon - this is the number of days we are calculating for.

    • Method Detail

      • calculate

        public double calculate()
        This method is part of the calculator interface. It returns the Value at Risk for the historical simulation method.
        Specified by:
        calculate in interface Calculator
        Returns:
        - this is the value at risk, calculated and in the form of a double, where 100% is 1.0

      • sort

        public static ArrayList<Double> sort(ArrayList<Double> list)
        This method sorts an ArrayList into ascending order. It is used to find percentile points.
        Parameters:
        list - - an unsorted list is given ready to be sorted
        Returns:
        a sorted list is returned in ascending order.

      • toInt

        public static int toInt(double a)
        This casts a double to an integer. This is used because we can only search for an integer position in an array not a double.
        Parameters:
        a - this is the double passed through.
        Returns:
        an integer is returned.
